Changelog for django-double-entry
=================================

--------------------

Features:

- add accounting related functionality


1.0.2 [02-11-2024]
--------------------

Features:

- add `system_id` to curreny, account and account_heading models

--------------------

Features:

- add OrganizationAccountSetup


1.0.4 [03-11-2024]
--------------------

Features:

- add account ids


1.0.5 [03-11-2024]
--------------------

Features:

- Rename currency account entry related name


1.0.6 [03-11-2024]
